Black Cat:
Welcome, kiddo. Has my calling you 'kiddo' annoyed you? Well, I've lived for hundreds of years, so everyone is a kid to me!
But you kiddos nowadays have a lot of fight in you. Like that Arcturus, the new Hunter Guild President.
Originally, I was thinking of leaving the Hunter Guild, but I have decided to stay to partake in the dreams of Arcturus. I received a request from Aria Furstmater as well. Well.
